channel.title: Invalid Player Index
channel.description:
I recently added Dragon Claws, along with special by following the guide by smkscape on this topic --[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,346676.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,346676.0.html[/url]
However, when ever I use d claw special on another player, it says attackPlayer: Invalid player index (I cant use spec on npc's also.)
Anyone know whats wrong or a solution? Thanks ;)

item.title: Invalid Player Index
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
